EmailTemplate.description: Email communication sent to the original injury owner to inform that the responsible of triage has reviewed and agreed to close the injury as no non-compliance was identified
EmailTemplate.name: 15 - SLGSA case with no noncompliance Approved and Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Injury associated to Provider {!Case.Provider_Name_For_Email_Merge__c} has been reviewed by {!Case.Triage_Responsible__c} and has been closed
